mapper.select: SELECT ps.schedule_id AS scheduleId, ps.sch_nm AS scheduleName, DATE_FORMAT(ps.sch_start_date, '%Y%m%d') AS startDate, DATE_FORMAT(ps.sch_end_date, '%Y%m%d') AS endDate, DATE_FORMAT(ps.time_start, '%H:%i') AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT(ps.time_end, '%H:%i') AS endTime, 'playList' AS type FROM playlist_schedule as ps WHERE (ps.sch_start_date >= #{startDate}) AND (ps.sch_end_date <= #{endDate}) UNION ALL SELECT lps.schedule_id, lps.sch_nm, DATE_FORMAT(lps.sch_start_date, '%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(lps.sch_end_date, '%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(lps.time_pwr_on, '%H:%i'), DATE_FORMAT(lps.time_pwr_off, '%H:%i'), 'power' FROM led_pwr_schedule as lps WHERE (lps.sch_start_date >= #{startDate}) AND (lps.sch_end_date <= #{endDate}) UNION ALL SELECT bs.schedule_id, bs.sch_nm, DATE_FORMAT(bs.sch_start_date, '%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(bs.sch_end_date, '%Y%m%d'), null, null, 'light' FROM brightness_schedule as bs WHERE (bs.sch_start_date >= #{startDate}) AND (bs.sch_end_date <= #{endDate})

SELECT bs.schedule_id AS schedule_id, bs.sch_nm AS sch_nm, bs.sch_start_date AS sch_start_date, bs.sch_end_date AS sch_end_date, bs.run_day_week AS run_day_week, bcl.list_id AS list_id, bcl.runtime AS runtime, bcl.Brightness_val AS Brightness_val FROM brightness_schedule AS bs INNER JOIN brightness_control_lists AS bcl on bs.schedule_id = bcl.schedule_id WHERE bs.schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
